# logtail_dashboard (Data Source)

This data source allows you to look up existing dashboards using their ID or name. For more information about the Dashboard API check https://betterstack.com/docs/logs/api/dashboards/



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) The ID of the dashboard to retrieve.
- `name` (String) The name of the dashboard.
- `team_name` (String) The team name associated with the dashboard.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) The time when this dashboard was created.
- `data` (String) The dashboard configuration data in JSON format.
- `team_id` (Number) The team ID of the dashboard.
- `updated_at` (String) The time when this dashboard was last updated.
